short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save content on Jolt Demo website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever experienced the frustration of losing your meticulously crafted spec on the Jolt demo website due to an unexpected page refresh? ðŸ˜– We understand how disheartening it can be to see all your hard work vanish in an instant. But worry no more! We have the perfect solution for you. ðŸ¤©

Introducing Jolt Saver, the revolutionary Chrome extension designed specifically to save your precious specs on the Jolt demo website. With Jolt Saver by your side, you can bid farewell to the fear of losing your carefully written logic and specifications. ðŸ˜„

Don't let a page refresh erase your hard work ever again. Empower yourself with Jolt Saver and experience the peace of mind that comes with knowing your specs are protected. 

Additionally, we have also rewritten the version number on the Jolt Demo site, as the developer had forgotten to update it. The corrected version number now accurately reflects the current version of Jolt, which is v0.1.6.

Here's how to use Jolt:

1. Install the extension in your browser.
2. That's all you have to do.

Jolt Saver will automatically save your last performed transformation.

Even if you close your browser and return to the Jolt Demo website, you will find your last performed transformation saved on it.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with!
